title: End Of First Round (Part 2)
body:
End Of First Round (Part 2)

In just one hour Evan killed four of the five A rank monsters present in the small world. After killing four monsters he got only one A rank core, but he consoled himself by thinking that he could still absorb the bodies of those A rank monsters using energy absorption skill.

Currently, Evan was searching around the centre area of the small world, looking for the last A rank monster.

He already knew the location of the A+ rank monster present in the small world and before dealing with it, he wanted to kill the last A rank monster.

"Did you find it?" Evan asked Albelu who was moving towards the center of the small world. Waves of lightning were coming out from its body and were spreading all over the surroundings. It was Albelu's 'Lightning Detection' skill. This skill allows it to search for targets in an area of twenty kilometres around it as long as the target's rank is not higher than it.

Howl-!
